member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineMaxPolarityConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of LineMax polarity values.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineMaxPolarityConstants.DarkToLight
member.summary: The brightness transitions from dark to light, along the direction of the line normal.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineMaxPolarityConstants.LightToDark
member.summary: The brightness transitions from light to dark, along the direction of the line normal.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineMaxPolarityConstants.Either
member.summary: The brightness transitions from dark to light or from light to dark, but not both, along the direction of the line normal.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineMaxPolarityConstants.Mixed
member.summary: The brightness transitions from dark to light and from light to dark, along the direction of the line normal.

member.summary: Gets the unique ID used to identify this result.

member.summary: Gets the average intensity along the line segment.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineTool
member.summary: This is the class for the CogSmartLineTool. The CogSmartLineTool provides functionality for interacting with a Vision SmartLineTool from within a VisionPro environment.

remarks.para:
This tool has a non-standard structure. It provides an
property that allows for the automatic conversion of input images to be provided to the underlying SmartLineTool. However, all setting run parameters, setting training parameters, retrieving results, and any functionality beyond providing an input image and running the tool must be done through the
property. This property allows direct access to the SmartLine Tool; CogSmartLineTool provides a wrapper for it in order to enable its use within ToolBlocks and other existing VisionPro architecture.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineTool.SfInputImage
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by InputImage may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineTool.SfVisionInteropTool
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by VisionInteropTool may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineTool.SfResults
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Results may have changed.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.SmartLine.CogSmartLineTool.Run
member.summary:
Run the SmartLine tool on the current InputImage and place the SmartLine results in the Results collection. The tool will run using an internally held Vision SmartLine Tool that has been trained and configured directly through the
property.
member.remarks: Note that, like all VisionPro tools, run time errors will be reported in the RunStatus.
